documentation.text:
@title State controller
 @notice Contain functions to control transition of the game state

@title State controller
 @notice Contain functions to control transition of the game state

returns._0: the pawn index if a pawn is present, -1 if no pawn is present on this location
true if the pawn is still alive

params.x: x coordinate where to move the pawn
params.y: y coordinate where to move the pawn

returns._0: the new state once the pawn has been moved
true if NO pawn is present, false otherwise
the new state once the pawn has been removed

params.pawnType: the type of the pawn to respawn
params.x: x coordinate to respawn the pawn
params.y: y coordinate to respawn the pawn

returns._0: the new state once the pawn has been respawned

params.pawnType: the new type of the pawn to respawn

returns._0: the new state once the pawn has been respawned

getPawnAt(uint8[121],uint8,uint256).notice: Get the pawn present in a specific location in the map

getPawnNumber(uint8[121]).notice: Get the number of pawns in the game

getPawnPosition(uint8[121],uint8).notice: Get the position of a specific pawn in the game

getPawnType(uint8[121],uint8).notice: Get the type of a specific pawn in the game, the type is what defines the pawn (e.g allows to get the specific smart contract of the pawn)

isAlive(uint8[121],uint8).notice: Determine if a specific pawn in the game is still alive

movePawn(uint8[121],uint8,uint8,uint8).notice: Perform the state transition when moving a pawn on the map

noPawnAt(uint8[121],uint8,uint256).notice: Check if a pawn is present on a specific location

removePawn(uint8[121],uint8).notice: Perform the state transition when removing a pawn from the game

respawnPawn(uint8[121],uint8,uint8,uint8.notice: Perform the state transition when change the pawn type or revive a pawn in the game

transformPawn(uint8[121],uint8,uint8).notice: Perform the state transition when change the pawn type of a pawn in the game

userdoc.notice: Contain functions to control transition of the game state
